name: Dice Game (itch) (waza_Dev)
description:
Game Made For the Gmtk Game Jam 2022 in 48 hours

Play As a faceless die and try to Survive for as many waves as possible on A board,

Press 'Space' to when you dice start rolling to chose your Ability and Turns.

The Turn Die shows how many Times you can Use an ability die For. Kill all enemies and Get a higher score.

Controls

'R' to restart

'Space' to Stop dice

'LMB' to fire at an enemy and move to a position

Music

https://www.zapsplat.com

Art and Mostly Everything Else

By me, i can finally make art for games 😎

Game Juice

All those fancy effects i'm using to mask how bad the game is are made using FEEL and ALL IN 1 SPRITE SHADER
